channel.title: Rune-Navia PK! Vps Hosted
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10zcz69.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://rune-navia.net/index.php"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rune-navia.net/index.php?board=25.0"]PlayNow[/URL] [URL=http://"http://rune-navia.net/index.php?board=26.0"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.google.com/toplist/vote-28502.html"]Vote[/URL]
Rune-Navia's Economy is based off of Skilling and Pking, However that is not all we have. Rune-Navia has over 10 Custom Minigame and every skill is trainable. We don't stop there... We a wide variety of bosses for great PVM including: Nex, Nomad, Godwars, and other custom Bosses which you'll have to play to find out.
[COLOR="#FFFF00"]What you should look foward from playing Rune-Navia[/COLOR]
-Perfect Fletching, Crafting, Herblore, Mining, Woodcutting, Smelting, Hunter -Prestige System -Rune-Navia Point System -Rune-Navia Point Shop -Many processes Cycle Based -Perfect Fullscreen -Resizeable Client -Dicing -Crystal Chest -Prestige Chest -Mystery Eggs -Money for Levels -Achievements -Ganodermic -Primal -Korasi,Godswords,Dragon Claws -Polypore -All Nex Armours -100% correct bonus's -Custom Player Pannel -Custom Shop Interface -100% Price Checker/Items on Death -Donator Pannel -Achievement System -Many Minigames and Bosses to keep you entertained -100% Friend/Ignore List -Custom Yell Channels (Global,Trade,Bossing,Minigame,Spam) -Cash Storage System -Perfect Prayers -Unique Home -Multi/Solo Pk zones -100% combat -Total Level 2277 -Report Abuse System -Clan Chat System -Emotes
[COLOR="#FFFF00"]Skilling Base[/COLOR]
-Attack -Strength -Defence -Range -Prayer -Magic -RuneCrafting -Hunter -Dungeoneering -Hitpoints -Agility -Herblore -Thiefing -Crafting -Fletching -Slayer -Summoning -Mining -Smithing -Fishing -Cooking -FireMaking -WoodCutting -Farming -PK'ING
[COLOR="#FFFF00"]Heres some Media just to show you how Rune-Navia Looks.[/COLOR]
Welcome Screen [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/15yb1u1.png[/img] TOS [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/19a78x.png[/img] Pk [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2l2ed1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2zss4zl.png[/img] bank Pin [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zr3xjr.jpg[/img] Shops [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/6f2mhh.png[/img]

item.description:

Rune-Navia’s Economy is based off of Skilling and Pking, However that is not all we have. Rune-Navia has over 10 Custom Minigame and every skill is trainable. We don’t stop there… We a wide variety of bosses for great PVM including: Nex, Nomad, Godwars, and other custom Bosses which you’ll have to play to find out.

[COLOR="#FFFF00"]What you should look foward from playing Rune-Navia[/COLOR]
